[[Arab World]] | headquarters = | former names = | replaced names = | sister names = [[Disney Channel Scandinavia|Disney Channel]], [[Disney XD Scandinavia|Disney XD]] | timeshift names = | web = http://disneyinternational.com/disney-junior/ | terr serv 1 = | terr chan 1 = | sat serv 1 = [[Canal Digital]] | sat chan 1 = | sat serv 2 = [[Viasat]] | sat chan 2 = | sat serv 3 = [[Orbit Showtime]] | sat chan 3 = | cable serv 1 = [[Com Hem]] | cable chan 1 = | cable serv 2 = [[Yousee]] | cable chan 2 = | cable serv 3 = [[Canal Digital]] | cable chan 3 = | cable serv 4 = [[LumoTV]] | cable chan 4 = | cable serv 5 = [[Get]] | cable chan 5 = | cable serv 6 = [[Welho]] | cable chan 6 = | adsl serv 1 = [[Canal Digital]] | adsl chan 1 = | adsl serv 2 = [[Viasat]] | adsl chan 2 = }} '''Disney Junior Scandinavia''' is a television channel for preschoolers targeting the Nordic countries and Arab world. It doesn't screen advertising and is funded by subscriptions instead. It was launched in October 2006 on the [[Canal Digital]] and [[Viasat]] satellite plaltforms. Cable networks launched it later on. [[Com Hem]], the largest cable network in Sweden, launched it on April 2, 2007. Before September 10, 2011, this channel was called Playhouse Disney. == Programmes == *''[[Little Einsteins]]'' *''[[Jungle Cubs]]'' *''[[Mickey Mouse Clubhouse]]'' *''[[Jungle Junction]]'' *''[[Happy Monster Band]]'' *''[[Chuggington]]'' *''[[Handy Manny]]'' *''[[The Doodlebops]]'' *''[[Special Agent Oso]]'' *''[[Imagination Movers]]'' *''[[Art Attack]]'' *''[[The Hive]]'' *''[[The Amazing World of Gumball]]'' * ''[[Jake and the Never Land Pirates]]'' It broadcasts between 5 a.m. and 7 p.m. ([[GMT]]) [8 a.m. and 9 p.m. [[KSA]]] in [[Swedish language|Swedish]], [[Danish language|Danish]], [[Norwegian language|Norwegian]], [[Finnish language|Finnish]] and [[English language|English]]. ==References== {{Reflist|2}} ==External links== {{Portal box|Sweden|Media}} *[http://disneyinternational.com/disney-junior/ Disney Junior Gateway] {{Disney Channel}} {{Swedish television channels}} {{Finnish television channels}} [[Category:Pan-Nordic television channels]] [[Category:Television channels and stations established in 2006]] [[Category:Disney Channel]] [[Category:Children's television networks]]
